beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: Montana Rockies Mountain Adventure. Show up if you can sustain power at 7 thousand feet and don't mind walking your bike through Hell's Kitchen when the grades hit double digits. This isn't about gravel handling. it's about whether your legs can push a big gear up endless climbs while your lungs remember what thin air feels like. Skip it if you think 9 thousand feet of elevation sounds fun on paper.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If BWR Montana (Belgian Waffle Ride Montana) isn't quite right for you. Leadville Trail 100 MTB gives you the same altitude suffering with actual prize money. While Unbound keeps you closer to sea level if you prefer speed over elevation. For pure climbing masochism without the gravel pretense, just ride Mount Washington Hillclimb and save yourself 86 miles of buildup.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.
